INSERT INTO PROD_CRAFWORK_MAIN_PLM ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, PATH_NO, RAISE_USER, RAISE_DATE, ORG_ID, PROD_NO, STATUS, VERSIONS, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raiseUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raiseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_CRAFWORK_MAIN_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_CRAFWORK_MAIN_PLM
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH_NO = #{pathNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISE_USER = #{raiseUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISE_DATE = #{raiseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSIONS = #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
